name: Teen Wolf - Jackson for Tumblr Dash
description: A (hopefully) all-encompassing dashboard theme for tumblr featuring Jackson Whittemore from Teen Wolf. This is the most complete style I've ever attempted. It took hours, and was made for my twin. I don't ever want to attempt this full of a style again, especially since some of tumblr's annoying new quirks make certain areas look iffy regardless of styling. If you're having spacing issues on the sidebar, try choosing 'no' on the "Slim Sidebar?" option. It's also important that you select 'no' if you use XKit's option to slim the sidebar instead. Otherwise, it's highly suggested you keep the sidebar slimmed as the buttons are horribly large by default. If you can't stand the background image in text areas select the option to hide it. I'm now using a code which should work more consistently than the previous version. Let me know via feedback if there's a page where it doesn't work.
